sn22.73:1.2: “Assutavā, bhikkhave, puthujjano rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.73:1.6: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn22.73:1.7: Sutavā ca kho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako rūpassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānāti.
sn22.73:1.11: viññāṇassa assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti.
